name: hollywood wax was persian first - sandytoes2211
description:
puberty is tough in any culture. when i was 12, my mom told me that she remembered a girl was waxed all over to be prepared for her wedding night. this painful ritual caused her to start yanking out every little hair that came out so that she would be spared and suggested i start doing the same. 
i told her i would shave or find someone who liked a 'natural' woman and whether it is foot binding in china or waxing a young girl, we continue to internalize and pass on these destructive patterns of self torture.
